attributes.action: Revert Back to Councillors Being Unpaid
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We should revert back to making a councillor an unpaid job.This would help to decrease council tax bills and maybe keep more officers in work.
When councillors were unpaid most of them were business people wanted their towns to succeed.
Also they were use to running a business which is what a council really is.
